EPengine package¶

Submodules¶

EPengine.chiller module¶

EPengine.chiller.visBiquadratic(xr, yr, gsize, cL, xl, yl, ti, type=None, coef=1)¶

Visualize Biquadratic graph based on the input coefficient list

Parameters:
  • xr – xrange
  • yr – yrange
  • gsize – grid size
  • cL – coefficient list
  • xl – xlabel
  • yl – ylabel
  • ti – title
  • type – the value to visualize cop or cap(capacity)
  • coef – coefficient to be used for further calculation
Returns:
EPengine.chiller.visQuadratic(xr, gsize, cL, xl, yl, ti)¶
